title: Settting Up
text: Begin by setting up the coefficients. Write k and the coefficients.
speech: Begin by setting up the coefficients. Write k and the coefficients.
pacedSpeech: Begin by setting up the coefficients. Write k and the coefficients.

title: Beginning the Division
text: Bring down the lead coefficient. Multiply the lead coefficient by k.
speech: Bring down the lead coefficient. Multiply the lead coefficient by k.
pacedSpeech: Bring down the lead coefficient. Multiply the lead coefficient by k.

title: Full Solution
text: If you're stuck, check your work with the full solution below.\n##figure1.gif##
speech: If you're stuck, check your work with the full solution below.\n##figure1.gif##
pacedSpeech: If you're stuck, check your work with the full solution below.##figure1.gif##

title: Final Answer
text: Our result is $$4x^2+2x-10$$. There is no remainder.
speech: Our result is  4 x squared, plus 2 x minus 10 . There is no remainder.
pacedSpeech: Our result is   4 x squared, plus 2 x minus 10
